**Scorched Universe** is a [PICO-8](https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php) game based on the general idea of the old Scorched Earth games where you aim projectiles that take trajectory/angle/gravity into account, but in this case your goal is to clear the solar system of the pesky asteroids. This is a very early state for this game, and the actual goals are much bigger (more like scorched earth with a player on each planet, obstacles to avoid, different weapons, etc) but I whipped this up mostly to play with trajectory lines and gravity systems.

#### Instructions

Use the arrow keys to aim, button 1 to fire, and hold button 2 while using the arrows to fine-aim. Clear all the asteroids but if you hit a planet the universe explodes (don't ask why, it's just how this universe works).
